title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: A Mixed-Methods Approach to Understanding Factors in Adopting E-Learning Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain five key factors influencing e-learning technology acceptance (e.g., perceived usefulness, ease of use, technological factors).
Learners can compare the basic procedures and application cases of mixed research methods (quantitative/qualitative).
Learners can design and simulate strategies for utilizing e-learning tools in constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
